fields.description:
This is a request for styling android pickers, spinners, alert dialogs, etc...

In order to avoid creating a xml file with a android theme in app/platform/android/res/values, should be able to define the background and text color inside the titanium themes app/themes/NAME/config.json on app/config.json when there are no themes.

[stackoverflow android picker style|http://stackoverflow.com/questions/36726908/android-picker-style-theme/36768102?noredirect=1#comment61522891_36768102]
fields.summary: style android (spinner, picker, alert) in themes (config.json)
